text:
Hey everyone!

I'm currently running a Digital Marketing Agency in Krakow, Poland. I work both with well-established clients trying to increase their revenue and with an accelerator program for entrepreneurs. I'm very good at long-term projects aiming to increase the online visibility of my clients, and building verticals through connecting them, when possible. 

Currently, my clients are in Latin America & US, but I'm trying to replicate my strategy in Central Europe, focusing on the possibility of entrepreneurs exporting their goods or services to other European countries or other markets. 

I speak 6 languages and I'm very well-connected with people in different locations, in order to target local markets with a unique strategy. I also work with a team of 12 talented people, from web developers to designers or video editing professionals. 

If I can help you in any way, please feel free to contact me! You can find me on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/david-mesa-noack-2b2a0414/|LinkedIn> too!

Best regards,

David

text:
Hi everyone! My name is Marina Khonaisser and I am currently a Content Manager re-building the Content Department at a digital marketing and publishing company based in Edmonton, Alberta.

I have been working professionally as a content marketer, social media specialist, communications strategist, and more for almost 5 years now in industries such as bridal, tourism, food, entertainment, and much more. In my free time I also work with small, local businesses to enhance their digital strategies.

I am really excited to learn more from industry professionals and get insights on best practices for managing a content team and scaling. Open to conversations and DMs as well! Feel free to also connect with me on LinkedIn: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/marinakhonaisser/> :slightly_smiling_face:

text:
Hello everyone! My name is Thomas Holton, and I’m a graduating senior at the University of Florida. I’ve spent much of college working in journalism, with stories of mine picked up by outlets like the Associated Press and U.S. News & World Report.

Over the past year, my focus has shifted toward marketing. Beginning this summer, I’ve been working as a copywriter for the Agency, which is a strategic communications firm within my college.

I see content marketing as the perfect way to use the skills I’ve picked up in journalism in a marketing context. I know navigating this initial stage of my career will be a challenge, which is why I’m so excited for the chance to be a part of this community and learn from you all! Lastly, I’ll leave my LinkedIn here if you care to connect: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/thomas-holton-683602172|https://www.linkedin.com/in/thomas-holton-683602172>

text:
Howdy peeps,
 
Still consider myself a newbie in the content marketing world. 
 
Was doing web development at an agency 9 months ago and recently transitioned to working for an entrepreneur I respect, Noah Kagan.
 
My current focus is in YouTube growth and email marketing but would love to chat on any marketing-related topic.
 
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/george-chu-07/|Let’s connect on LinkedIn>. :taco:
